dcterms:description: The DRIVE dataset is used for retinal vessel segmentation, providing a set of color images of the retina for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: DRIVE

dcterms:description: The STARE dataset is utilized for blood vessel segmentation in retinal images, featuring a new supervised method that employs gray-level and moment invariants-based features.
dcterms:title: STARE
